dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your writing activity.

common.generatingContent: Generating content... This may take a moment.
common.fillFormToGenerate: Fill out the form and click "Generate Content" to see the result here.
common.authError: You must be logged in to generate content
common.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
common.generationError: An error occurred while generating content
common.noContentToSave: No content to save or user not authenticated
common.savingError: An error occurred while saving content

analytics.title: Analytics Overview
analytics.description: View your content generation analytics over time.
analytics.noData: No data available. Start creating content to see analytics.

documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Create, manage, and organize your AI-generated content.
documents.authError: Authentication error. Please sign in again.
documents.loadError: Failed to load documents. Please try again later.
documents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Use pre-built templates to quickly generate content.

descriptions.blogPostIntro: Create an engaging introduction for your blog post
descriptions.landingPageCopy: Persuasive copy for your landing pages
descriptions.adCopy: Compelling ad copy for various platforms
descriptions.caseStudy: Create detailed case studies showcasing your success stories
descriptions.linkedinPost: Professional content optimized for LinkedIn's platform
descriptions.welcomeEmail: Onboarding email series for new subscribers
descriptions.facebookAdCopy: Targeted ad copy for Facebook campaigns
descriptions.aboutUsPage: Compelling company story for your website
descriptions.howToGuide: Step-by-step instructional content for your audience
descriptions.promotionalEmail: Sales-focused emails for special offers and promotions
descriptions.googleAdsCopy: Optimized ad copy for Google search campaigns
descriptions.faqPage: Comprehensive FAQ content for your website
descriptions.featureComparison: Highlight product features and benefits against competitors

blog-post-introduction.title: Blog Post Introduction
blog-post-introduction.description: Create an engaging introduction for your blog post

form.title: Fill in the details
form.description: Provide information to generate your blog post introduction
form.topicPlaceholder: Enter the main topic of your blog post
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your content
form.keyPointsPlaceholder: List the key points you want to cover (optional)

preview.description: Review your generated blog post introduction

product-description.title: Product Description
product-description.description: Create compelling product descriptions that convert

form.title: Fill in the details
form.description: Provide information to generate your product description
form.productNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of your product
form.productTypePlaceholder: What type of product is this?
form.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: List the main features and benefits of your product
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your content
form.additionalInstructionsPlaceholder: Any specific requirements or information to include

social-media-post.title: Social Media Post
social-media-post.description: Create engaging content for your social media platforms

form.title: Fill in the details
form.description: Provide information to generate your social media post
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your content
form.goalPlaceholder: What's the goal of this post? (e.g., drive traffic, increase engagement)
form.callToActionPlaceholder: What action do you want readers to take?

preview.description: Review your generated social media post

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Create professional email newsletters for your audience

form.title: Fill in the details

form.newsletterNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of your newsletter
form.topicPlaceholder: What is the main topic of this newsletter?
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your content
form.keyPointsPlaceholder: List the key points you want to cover
form.callToActionPlaceholder: What action do you want readers to take?
form.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Any other details you'd like to include

form.title: Fill in the details
form.description: Provide information to generate your SEO blog post
form.secondaryKeywordsPlaceholder: Enter secondary keywords separated by commas
form.topicPlaceholder: What is your blog post about?
form.outlinePlaceholder: Provide an outline or key points (optional)

form.title: Fill in the details

form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your caption

landing-page-copy.title: Landing Page Copy
landing-page-copy.description: Create compelling landing page copy that converts visitors into customers

form.title: Template Information
form.description: Fill out the form to generate landing page copy
form.productServicePlaceholder: What product or service are you promoting?
form.mainBenefitPlaceholder: What is the main benefit of your product/service?
form.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: List the key features of your product/service (one per line)
form.painPointsPlaceholder: What problems does your product/service solve?
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your landing page
form.callToActionPlaceholder: What action do you want visitors to take?
form.includeTestimonialsPlaceholder: Should the copy include testimonial placeholders?

preview.description: Your landing page copy will appear here

ad-copy.description: Create versatile ad copy for various platforms.

form.description: Fill in the details about your ad to generate compelling copy.

form.mainBenefitPlaceholder: What is the main benefit of your product/service?
form.tonePlaceholder: Select the tone for your ad

form.resultsPlaceholder: Describe the results or outcomes achieved
